about_the_game:
WHAT WILL YOU DISCOVER BELOW?


Get ready to earn while you learn in Oil Strike ’75, a fun, exciting, and educational new game from Cadal Corp. where you’re tasked with running a rig and discovering new oil deposits at the bottom of the sea – no matter the cost. Who knows what you’ll find!

Utilise super-safe seismic exploration to discover oil wells deep beneath the ground. Hop in and pilot a helicopter to bring vital supplies from shore. Run, jump, and climb your way to the top of the rig as you build your drill longer and longer – just be sure to avoid the totally normal health hazards! Then use the money you’ve earnt from completing jobs to drill as deep as you can and discover brand new oil deposits that will help keep your rig afloat and most importantly make your shareholders super happy. Oh and don’t worry, there’s no such thing as too deep when you drill with Cadal!

  • Learn the business of drilling for oil as you complete three fun yet increasingly tricky tasks to earn money to make your drill longer
  • The more you complete, the longer your drill becomes, and the deeper you can go!
  • Earn exclusive Steam achievements!
  • Keep playing and who knows what you’ll discover!

Please note: If you should discover any bugs, please call our bug hotline on: 0325 75
